title: Interpretation of dreams about seeing fire in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing hell fire in a dream. God Almighty created man and gave him the freedom to choose the place in which he chooses the path of guidance and piety, and his reward on the Day of Resurrection will be the Paradise that God has prepared for believers, which is the result of goodness. Actions on the Day of Resurrection What are these signs and indications that seeing the fire of Hell according to the major scholars and sheikhs, and what is the interpretation of the dream of seeing the fire of Hell in a dream? Interpretation of the dream of seeing Hell in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi and seeing fire in a dream indicates the bad condition of the dreamer and the disasters and calamities that he will be exposed to. she has. Bad friends appear in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of a dream about hell by Ibn Sirin: The dreamer sees hell in the dream and sees himself burning in the fire. This vision indicates the badness of the afterlife, which is the result of his deeds in this world, if he does not turn away from his bad deeds in this world. As for seeing someone close to you throwing you In the fire of hell, this indicates that this person has bad intentions towards the dreamer and makes him go on the wrong path and causes him troubles and problems in this world. As for seeing the fire of hell in a dream, this vision indicates that you will fall into the misfortunes and sorrows of this world. Seeing the dreamer enter hell. As this vision indicates destruction, worries, and sadness, many problems will appear in his life. As for the dreamer who sees that his face is black after entering the fire of hell, it symbolizes the evil friends who accompany him in this world. As for whoever sees in a dream that he is walking on hot coals, this It indicates bad behavior. As for seeing a person entering Hell, this vision symbolizes that he is committing immorality and evil in this world and that his fate is the torment of Hell. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing embers in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-SadiqInterpretation of a dream about Al-Nabulsi seeing Hell: The great scholar Al-Nabulsi explained About the dreamer who sees himself entering Hell in a dream, indicating the commission of sins, stress and sadness in his life. Seeing the dreamer as if a fire approached him in the dream indicates his pain. Seeing the dreamer still stuck in hell shows his sadness and poverty in this world and the abundance of his worries. The dreamer who sees himself eating from hell and familiar things as well as pus, this is evidence of guilt and bloodshed. Seeing the dreamer as if his face is black and his eyes are blue in the fire of hell, which indicates his connection The enemy of God and his association with his evil friends. The sick person’s vision that he entered the fire of hell and came out of it indicates the disappearance of sins and transgressions and repentance before death. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing the Angel of Death in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of the dream of the dead being tortured in the fire of hell: Seeing the dead being tortured In hell, it symbolizes the poor condition of the deceased or that the dreamer has bad behavior and needs to repent and return to God. See also: Interpretation of seeing fire in a dream by Ibn ShaheenInterpretation of a bad dream of seeing the fire of hell: Seeing hell in a dream also indicates loss of position and loss of prestige. Seeing fire Hell in a dream also indicates imprisonment and shame in this world. Seeing the fire of hell in a dream means that the dreamer indulges in desires and commits sins.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a thread in a dream and its meaning

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing thread in a dream by Ibn Sirin Confirmed by Ibn Sirin Seeing threads intertwined and complex in dream representations is envy. Seeing thread wrapping around the body symbolizes the journey of a prophet. Whoever dreams with a linen or cotton thread, it is a sign of illness. The meaning of seeing a white thread Seeing a white thread in a dream is a sign of the dreamer’s bright future. It may indicate the vulva after Torment. It indicates the end of problems and crises. It suggests that medicines are a disease. The meaning of a dream about a black thread in a dream. A black thread in a dream is a warning of crises, problems and troubles. Whoever sees his enemy in a dream holding the black thread and looking at it, this is a sign that he is conspiring against him. Seeing the black thread It symbolizes the doubt and uncertainty that the dreamer feels. Interpretation of seeing green and red thread. Whoever sees a green thread in a dream shows goodness, blessings, and food to the dreamer. The red thread in a dream symbolizes ambition and goals and indicates the dreamer’s effort to achieve them. The meaning of seeing colored threads in a dream. Seeing colored threads in a dream symbolizes fun, happiness, and success. Dreaming of a gray thread indicates lying and perjury. The meaning of dreaming of complicated threads in a dream. Whoever dreams with complicated threads in a dream means that he is trying to achieve his desires and goals but in an illegitimate way. Seeing tangled threads indicates problems and difficulties that the viewer is going through. Intricately woven threads symbolize illness and poverty. Interpretation of a vision Needle thread and shoe thread: Dreaming of needle thread in a dream symbolizes the vulva. As for the one who sees that the shoelace is broken, it is an indication of the approaching vulva after severe discomfort. The meaning of seeing thread in a dream for a pregnant woman: The thread in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates childbirth. As for the one who dreams that she is carrying a golden thread, it indicates her health and the safety of her fetus. The red thread in her dream symbolizes a male baby. Light colors indicate a female. The black thread indicates exhaustion during the months of pregnancy. The thread in one girl’s dream. Seeing a silk thread in a dream symbolizes engagement. The golden thread is a sign of marriage by a wealthy man. Add the dream you would like to interpret with reference to Marital status in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about throwing stones in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the meaning of a dream about throwing stones in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen. We present to you today on Mozaat website the interpretation of the meaning of a dream about stones and stones in a dream and everything that is new and distinctive on our website. In a dream website, seeing throwing stones in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Throwing stones in a dream. Stones in a dream. Interpretation. The presence of stones in a dream. The meaning of a dream of throwing stones in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of a dream of throwing stones in a dream. Muhammad Ibn Sirin mentioned in his book “Interpretation of Great Dreams” that seeing stones in a dream means lying and slander. Throwing stones at an unsecured fortress, which indicates the call of the people of this world. The house leads to goodness and justice. Seeing a catapult stone indicates the cruelty of those sent with it, and throwing stones from above means oppression and injustice. Raising stones in a dream indicates the dreamer’s struggle and resistance to overcome obstacles and challenges. Victory over the enemy, and the stone falling is a sign of weakness and weakness, and the stone is in the body. It can symbolize an ignorant and cruel boy. Someone threw a stone indicating his injustice, and the dreamer threw a stone at a woman indicating strife and heresy, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about throwing stones for a single woman: Seeing an unmarried girl in her dream, as if someone was throwing stones at her, indicates what surrounds her. It contains deception, evil, and corruption. Seeing large stones is an indication of great harm that will happen to her, and seeing small stones or pebbles indicates a weak conspiracy that a single woman can overcome and deal with. As for seeing an unmarried woman throwing stones at others, this is evidence of avoiding harm. As for seeing an unmarried woman picking up stones in a dream, this indicates her innocence and sincerity. Also, collecting stones and stacking them in an unmarried woman’s dream could indicate money after fatigue and unhappiness or symbolize marriage, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of throwing stones for a married woman. As for seeing stones In a married woman’s dream, seeing a married woman as if stones were falling on her house means that she will face many problems, worries, and problems. As for a married woman’s dream as if stones had turned into birds or living creatures, this portends the disappearance of problems, worries, and good intentions for the family members. Seeing white stones is A symbol of obtaining money. The married woman throws a white stone near the money, and the black stone symbolizes the blessing of her life. Seeing a large stone in a married woman’s dream is evidence of a husband, and the sight of a hard stone indicates a cruel, cruel son. For a woman to see in her sleep is as if emptying her house of stones is a sign. On family or social disputes, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about throwing stones for a pregnant woman. As for a pregnant woman who sees stones in her dream, it indicates the birth of a boy, and seeing soft stones indicates a female. In general, it is good news and an easy birth, God willing, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. As for the man’s interpretation Whoever sees stones in a dream, seeing a man who throws stones or pebbles indicates that he will be exposed to crimes and gossip. As for the one who throws stones and pebbles in his sleep unintentionally,

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the appearance of animals in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing animals in a dream Animals in a dream are one of the many visions that some people may see, and each animal has a different interpretation. Pets are evidence of good news, and predatory animals indicate evil, especially if they chase or bite the fortune teller, but if blood appears due to the wound of the animal's teeth, the dream is corrupt and has no interpretation. Interpretation of dreams about animals When a man sees a gazelle in a dream, this indicates his marriage to a beautiful and generous woman. When an unmarried woman sees a tiger in her dream while she is inside her house, this is evidence of the presence of a new husband, but she is characterized by evil and criminality. If a married or pregnant woman sees a tiger entering her house, this is evidence that she will give birth to a boy who will exhaust her and his father in life, and will only harm her with disobedience. As for seeing most pets, it shows psychological stability for a man, while seeing a cat indicates the presence of an enemy in the dreamer's life. Animal urine in a dream When the fortune teller sees that an animal has urinated on him in a dream, this is evidence of his corruption and perhaps he earns illegal money from the trade of pigs and alcohol and whatever comes to his mind or the arms trade or similar criminal matters. To the Islamic religion. Animal urine on a person in a dream. Also, seeing a person that an animal urinates on him may be in contact with people who are characterized by ignorance and do not appreciate knowledge and scholars, and he may live with these people as the people of Lot, and it is a message from the Lord of the Worlds to repent and that God is Forgiving and Merciful. What is the interpretation of seeing animals in a dream for Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin says that when the dreamer dreams of an animal, it is necessary to determine its type, whether it is a predatory animal or an animal. But predatory animals usually keep people away, who often live in forests, there are animals such as lions and tigers that love their trainers, but if they are hungry, they betray them and eat them, and this vision shows the proximity of death. Ibn Sirin explains that a person’s vision of a dog in a dream is evidence of the presence of a loyal friend or servant who is characterized by honesty or treachery, and this varies according to the vision. Feeding animals in a dream for Ibn Sirin is one of the beautiful dreams that reveal the extent of the dreamer’s love for his Lord and following everything he said in the Qur’an about the mercy and kindness of animals, seeing him in providing food for any of the animals because this vision is a sign of feeding the poor and contributing to many good deeds, such as preparing brides And building houses for the poor, and educating young children who are unable to pay school fees and others, in addition to giving zakat according to the provisions of religion. If the dreamer sees a calm cat in his dream, bringing her food and allowing her to eat it. This dream gives positive connotations, the first of which is family stability that satisfies the dreamer. About calamities, protection and health. Interpretation of a dream about predators by Ibn Sirin The hyena is one of the harmful animals that has the ability to kill a person and eat his flesh, and if the dreamer rides the back of this animal in a dream, this is a sign of his victory over a woman who harms others. Magic. The dreamer who rides on the back

title: Clouds, white and dark clouds in the dream of a married, pregnant and single woman

preview.html: Dear brothers and sisters, welcome to the dream interpretation website. In the previous article, we learned about the interpretation of seeing clouds in a dream by Ibn Sirin, but in this article we will try to present a psychological approach to seeing clouds and clouds. Among the topics that will be covered in this article are white and black clouds in a dream. Interpretation of cloud dreams for single, married and pregnant women, along with many other phenomena that may be associated with a cloud dream. Interpretation of seeing white clouds and clouds in a dream White clouds or clouds in a dream usually express the omens that the dreamer can expect, if they are high or far away in the sky As for the white clouds near the dreamer, they are his profession. If they obscure his vision like fog, this is an expression of confusion or being lost in an atmosphere of psychological feelings that are sometimes just problems. A white cloud or cloud in a dream deserves praise if a beautiful image or scene appears in the dream. Blue sky. White clouds and clouds may portend to a married woman an imminent pregnancy. Dark clouds and clouds in a dream. Dark clouds and clouds, high and far, portend good, because they may be laden with rain and rain in the interpretation, living or marriage. As for the clouds that are dense and close to the fortuneteller or form a barrier In front of him prevents him from seeing or looking, in interpretation they are often a symbol of psychological obstacles or barriers, and dark overcast clouds in the sky can indicate anxiety, alienation or psychological loneliness of the viewer. Most of those who see dark clouds in a dream are people who suffer from loneliness or have A mysterious view of the future. Dark clouds can express great sadness if the dream is accompanied by a deep feeling of depression, anxiety, or confusion. A person who feels happy and secure looking at dark clouds in his dream has a strong desire for success and ambition, and most of them have the ability to challenge and achieve goals. And achieving them. Interpretation of catching clouds in a dream If you see in your dream that you are holding a cloud or a white cloud, its interpretation is good, because the dream expresses the extent of your supernatural abilities that may help you in waking life to fulfill desires and achieve the impossible. The position of clouds or dark clouds in a dream can also indicate Clinging to negative or unrealistic illusions and thoughts. This interpretation applies to a person whose fears and problems have accumulated in a waking state without seeking to solve or overcome them. Interpretation of walking on clouds in a dream Walking confidently on clouds without tripping or falling indicates the viewer’s ingenuity and social or practical skills, and the dream portends unparalleled success in the future. Where the dreamer can reach high ranks and achieve his highest ambitions. Seeing clouds and clouds in a woman’s dream. The interpretation of a dream about clouds and clouds for individuals is subject to a group of elements that must be taken into consideration, the first of which is the color of the clouds, as white clouds are considered better than black clouds or dark gray clouds. Most likely white clouds

title: Interpretation of a dream about my brother marrying my friend in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my brother marrying my girlfriend in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about my brother marrying my girlfriend in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about my brother marrying my girlfriend in a dream It could be a sign of kindness and happiness for the dreamer, and God knows best. In the event that an unmarried girl sees her brother marrying her friend, this may indicate relief, and God is Most High. I know that if the dreamer sees his brother marrying his girlfriend, this may indicate the repayment of debts, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees a brother marrying his girlfriend in a dream, this may be evidence of a benefit that the brother will receive, God willing. Interpretation of dreams of my brother slaughtering a sheep in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my brother slaughtering a sheep. In a dream, slaughtering a sheep in a dream could represent liberation from adversity and adversity, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees a sheep slaughtered in a dream, it may be a sign of deliverance from adversity, and God knows best. If a divorced woman sees a sheep slaughtered in a dream, this may lead to the end of a disaster, and God knows best. The highest and most knowledgeable: If a married man sees slaughtering a sheep in a dream, it may be money from a distinguished person, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams for my brother expelling me from the house in a dream. Interpretation of dreams for my brother expelling me from the house in a dream, and we did not find specific interpretations to see that. However, seeing negation in a dream could be a sign On anxiety and sadness, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If the dreamer sees that he is being chased in a dream, this may be evidence of imprisonment and restriction of freedom, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees that he is expelling someone from the house in a dream, it can express problems, and God knows the unseen. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a kiss on the hand in a dream

preview.html: Some people show their respect for fate or age through many manifestations, shapes, and images, and they show their respect for the elderly by kissing his hand or head, but what is the interpretation of seeing kissing the hand in a dream, and kissing the mother’s hand in a dream? We dream of kissing his wife’s hand, kissing the hand of the dead, and kissing the hand The patient, all of this can be seen in a dream and we do not know the interpretation or their meanings, but through this article we are trying to clarify the most important of them. The interpretations of these visions according to the opinions of the great interpreters of dreams. Interpretation of a dream about kissing the hand of Ibn SirinSometimes the interpretation of seeing a kiss on the hand is good, but it also speaks of evil. At other times. Watching the kiss of the sheikh he knows shows that the elderly are taking advantage of it. As for those who saw that they kissed the hand of a child but they are not children, his vision indicated that this person and the child’s family will have a close friendly relationship in the near future. Interpretation of the dream of kissing the left hand in A dream indicates success. Likewise, whoever sees in his dream that he is kissing the hand of someone he does not know, his vision indicates that he will meet a new person, who will guide him on the right path and perhaps from this knowledge he will obtain it. money. Knowledge. If a woman sees that she kissed her hand, this indicates kindness and happiness in her life. A dream about kissing the hand of a famous old man means that the dreamer is humble and may mean that he is taking advantage of the old man. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a hand in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq & # 8211 ; My magazine: Interpretation of a dream about a woman kissing a pot. Interpretation of a kiss on the father’s hand in a dream for a woman showing the beauty of her life among people. Interpretation of seeing a man kissing a woman’s left hand proves that he will marry that person. Interpretation of a dream about being kissed by a lover can prove that there is tension in their relationship, and it is an unstable relationship. Interpretation of a dream about a kiss on the hand of a married woman. If a married woman sees herself in a dream kissing her husband’s hand and vice versa, then this vision indicates a strong love between them. But if the wife suspects that the husband is cheating on her in reality and sees in a dream that the husband is in front of her, then she must put an end to her doubts in wakefulness. The husband, his anxiety, and his failure to listen to others. See also: Interpretation of a dream about kissing on the head in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq & # 8211; My magazine: Interpretation of a dream about kissing a pregnant woman’s hand: Seeing a pregnant woman kissing her husband’s hand, and her vision indicates that she will give birth to a healthy child. However, if a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is kissing the hand of her father, uncle, or older brother, then her vision portends a good life. Interpretation of a dream about kissing a man’s hand: Seeing it In a dream, he kisses the hands, which are the hands of a girl he does not know, indicating that he has neglected the right to worship and pray. And kissing the hand of an old woman or sheikh that he does not know, his vision indicates that he will occupy an important position at work. Seeing a loved one kissing in a dream is a sign of the presence of A real problem. Seeing the hand and kissing the head in a man’s dream proves that he is a calm person and hates problems and conflicts. See also: Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream of seeing a severed hand in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of kissing the mother’s hand proves the dream interpretation of the title.

title: What is the interpretation of a dream when you see a king on a horse in a dream?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream when you see a king on a horse in a dream? The horse is one of the animals that has a degree of pride and pride among animals. It is a strong and fast animal and is highly appreciated among kings and princes. He advised us to teach our children to ride horses so that they would be strong children, and we will learn today in our article on the encyclopedia website about the interpretation of a horse in a dream being the interpretation of riding for a king, a man, and a lady. And this dream brings good or evil. Interpretation of riding on the back of a horse in a dream: Whoever sees in his dream that he is standing on the back of a horse and walking with it, this is evidence that the dreamer has a high status among people, and that he has good morals and religion. He is dear to all people (and God knows best). Whoever sees in his dream that he is riding a horse without a bridle, then this dream indicates the death of the dreamer of worry and extreme anxiety (and God knows best). Riding on the back of a horse in a dream also indicates that the dreamer will be granted by God. Come to visit His Holy House and Medina soon (and God knows best). Whoever sees in his dream that he is sitting on a horse and the horse is flying in the sky, this is evidence that the dreamer will fulfill all his desires, and God Almighty will give him ample provision (and God knows best). Whoever sees in his dream that he is riding on the back of a horse, but this horse walks very slowly, this means that the dreamer will face some problems that will affect his life for a short period and will be so. Solve it, God willing (and God knows best). Whoever sees in his dream that he is riding a horse, and this horse is angry and rebellious, then this is evidence that the dreamer will do some immoral and forbidden acts (and God knows best). Whoever sees in his dream that he is riding a horse but it is made of iron, then this dream Not good in denoting death and destruction (and God knows best). Whoever sees in his dream that he is happy and cheerful playing with his horse, this indicates great nourishment and kindness for the dreamer (and God knows best). Whoever sees in his dream that he is carrying a small horse (pony) and it is beautiful in shape, This dream brings him happy news that the dreamer will give him a new child in the family and he will be the face of goodness. For him and his family (and God knows best). What is the interpretation of seeing a king on a horse in a dream: Whoever sees in his dream that he is riding a horse or a rider, and the dreamer is a king, a high-ranking person, or the lord of a city, then this dream is a sign of great goodness for that ruler and this God, Blessed be He. God Almighty gives him good news that he will triumph over all his enemies, that he will reach a position higher than his, and that his word will be heard and valued and appreciated among all people. It is announced that the owner of the vision is a person of morals and religion and follows the straight path in the governance and system of his family and tribe and that he is a very beloved person among the people and will be given to him by God, Blessed and Most High. And abundance of money (and God is Most High and Most Knowing). Interpretation of horse riding for a single girl: Whoever sees in her dream that she is riding a beautiful and strong horse, then this dream indicates that the dreamer will marry in the near future a young man of high social status, who has good morals and religion, and he will raise her. In the case, God willing (and God knows best). To interpret a different dream, you can use the Live Dream Interpretation application.

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a corpse in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see embracing a dead person in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen. This dream is one of the dreams that may appear in a person’s dream to indicate the emergence of a specific topic, as this dream may be. Frightening to some or full of tenderness that prompts a person to yearn, as agreed upon by many scholars in the interpretation of dreams, because the interpretation of this vision varies from one person to another and is based on many factors, including the social point of view. We present to you the article that explains the reality of this vision through dream interpreters Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen, so follow the rest of the article so that you can know all the details of the dream’s interpretation.Interpretation of the dream of seeing a corpse in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen.Interpretation of the dream of seeing a corpse in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The dream that you are hugging someone A married dead person in a dream is a sign of the collapse of their worries, overcoming obstacles and the death of marital disputes. Seeing a dead person smiling and happy is a sign of hearing happy news and overcoming problems and difficulties. Seeing a dead person’s voice of crying suggests to them anguish and stumbling over the life of a married woman. Seeing a dead dal embracing To travel and move to another part of the country or to immigrate to a country outside the city. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a corpse in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Seeing the deceased Farhan and Saeed is indicative of enjoying divine happiness, family and marital stability, and successful social relations. Seeing the dead fighting with the living, this is not considered good and is evidence of bad Behavior for the viewer or after getting close to God. Seeing the deceased’s longing for a living person and wanting to take him with him is a sign of the dreamer’s near future. Seeing an embrace and conversation with a dead married woman indicates her long life and improved living conditions. Interpretation of hugging a dead person in a dream Seeing someone in his sleep because A dead person hugging him passionately, this indicates the dreamer’s long life. But if the hug is anxious and sad, this is a sign of unpleasant things. Traveling with the deceased to another area, this is a sign of difficulties and obstacles that he will face in his life. Interpretation of hugging a dead unmarried girl. If an embrace The deceased in a married woman’s dream is a sign of achieving and reaching her goals. And also of her long life. And if the embrace with a feeling of sadness and anxiety indicates worries and problems. If the girl sees a dead person hugging her and offering her something, this is a sign of marriage that will come soon. Read also at the end Speaking about the interpretation of the dream of embracing the dead in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen, we learned about the clear and indicative interpretation of a point that was mostly confusing, good news.
